entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @PreetBharara I’m very concerned about the Coronavirus because of the inept imbeciles in the WH. We live in a disorganized, unresponsive society where many people can’t afford basic healthcare. Will they even see a doctor if they fall ill?
